lines.text: [last lines]
What do we do now?
So vote once, vote tuh-wice, for Bill McKay... you middle-class honkies.
This thing you call politics? Politics is bullshit.
I was wondering what it was.

[Jarmon's helicopter lands]
You know who that is, don't you?
Yeah. Smokey the Bear.
You're the Democratic nominee!
You make it sound like a death sentence.
I think you'll find we have a lot in common.
I don't think we have shit in common.
He's gonna get his ass kicked.
He's not gonna get his ass kicked.
Oh yeah? How can you be so sure?
Because he's cute!

[with his team after giving one speech too many]
Can't any longer play off black against old - young against poor. This country cannot house its houseless - feed its foodless.
[and he begins making gaga noises]
Did you really run your own campaigns?
Why, shit yes, what do you take me for?

[Introducing McKay to fund-raiser dinner audience]
Seriously folks, you better watch your step when he comes out here because he's a man who shoots from the hip and a man who's hip when he shoots. Join me in welcoming Bill McKay!
